brooklyn.location.jclouds
[Java] Class JcloudsPropertiesFromBrooklynProperties

java.lang.Object
  brooklyn.location.basic.LocationPropertiesFromBrooklynProperties
      brooklyn.location.jclouds.JcloudsPropertiesFromBrooklynProperties

public class JcloudsPropertiesFromBrooklynProperties
extends LocationPropertiesFromBrooklynProperties

The properties to use for a jclouds location, loaded from brooklyn.properties file

Preferred format is:
  • brooklyn.location.named.NAME.key
  • brooklyn.location.jclouds.PROVIDER.key

A number of properties are also supported, listed in the JcloudsLocationConfig

Authors:
andrea
